description: Reece has found himself in a very difficult position. The master has him restrained up against the cross, naked and vulnerable, his big dick on show for Kane to enjoy. With some slapping, wax torture and expert oral our prisoner is made to get hard, the precum ooozing from his helmet. That's not enough for the master, he wants to see the cum erupting out as he works that throbbing dick!
title: Reece Bentley & Sebastian Kane
